org.drinkless.td.libcore.telegram

Class TdApi.Channel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drinkless.td.libcore.telegram.TdApi.TLObject
      • org.drinkless.td.libcore.telegram.TdApi.Channel
  • Enclosing class:
    TdApi

    public static class TdApi.Channel
extends TdApi.TLObject
    Represents a channel with zero or more subscribers.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean anyoneCanInvite
      True, if any participant of the supergroup can invite other participants.
      static int CONSTRUCTOR
      Identifier uniquely determining TL-type of object
      int date
      Date when current user has joined the channel or date when channel was created, if user is not a participant.
      int id
      Channel identifier.
      boolean isBroadcast
      True, if only messages from admin and editors allowed in the channel.
      boolean isSupergroup
      True, if channel is supergroup.
      boolean isVerified
      True for verified channels.
      java.lang.String restrictionReason
      If non-empty, contains the reason, why access to this channel must be restricted, for example, "explicit".
      TdApi.ChatParticipantRole role
      Role of current user in the channel.
      boolean signMessages
      True, if messages sent to the channel should content information about the sender.
      java.lang.String username
      Channel username, empty for private channels.

    • Field Detail

      • id

        public int id
        Channel identifier.

      • username

        public java.lang.String username
        Channel username, empty for private channels.

      • date

        public int date
        Date when current user has joined the channel or date when channel was created, if user is not a participant. Unix time.

      • role

        public TdApi.ChatParticipantRole role
        Role of current user in the channel.

      • anyoneCanInvite

        public boolean anyoneCanInvite
        True, if any participant of the supergroup can invite other participants. If the channel is not a supergroup, the field is meaningless.

      • signMessages

        public boolean signMessages
        True, if messages sent to the channel should content information about the sender. If the channel is a supergroup, the field is meaningless.

      • isBroadcast

        public boolean isBroadcast
        True, if only messages from admin and editors allowed in the channel.

      • isSupergroup

        public boolean isSupergroup
        True, if channel is supergroup.

      • isVerified

        public boolean isVerified
        True for verified channels.

      • restrictionReason

        public java.lang.String restrictionReason
        If non-empty, contains the reason, why access to this channel must be restricted, for example, "explicit".

      • CONSTRUCTOR

        public static final int CONSTRUCTOR
        Identifier uniquely determining TL-type of object
